title: d3fx
author: d3fx
created_time: June 17, 2022, 10:13:58 PMLast edit: June 18, 2022, 05:14:37 AM by d3fx
content: Greetings,Do we have any investors in here that use this platform? https:// toxvoe.icu / INVUSDT ?Thanks!

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: How did you find this website?The website is pretty new so how does someone invest in this website?Whois says:Code:Registered On:2022-06-02Expires On:2023-06-02Updated On:2022-06-02There are some Chinese under the website script which is obvious the owner is Chinese. All investment sites that promise to double your investment are all scams there is no legit one. And this thread must be moved under service discussion.If you don't own this website I suggest edit your thread and remove the https:// so that the website won't get any backlinks here on the forum. If not then you are helping the website to promote and rank up on SERP.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: The site isn't opening for me, seems there is an error message when I open the site. So can't read any info about that site and not many reviews exist online. As BitMaxz said if the site offers double money then definitely a scam. If you are not shilling and just curious about that site, then stay away. Offer double money means simply scam. Doesn't necessary further investigation. Don't be greedy and don't lose your money.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: I dont know how you find this website and how can you say that it needs investment or what it offers because the site has basically no information of how it works. It only has login page and forgot page since registration page doesn't work. Plus, the website is using the logo of USDT which probably it's not affiliated and it's against the laws as trademark infringement. So, better to stay away to avoid any future issues.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: I don't know how you ended up finding this site, but it is definitely not the platform where I will deposit my money and I feel that I will not lose it.All the red flags are on the site so it doesn't matter how many temptations they may offer (1000% APY) as long as you may lose all your money.Avoid depositing money inTO unknown platforms.Avoid websites that look pretty good.Stay away from stablecoin projects.
